definitions.definition: A mechanical or electronic device that performs mathematical calculations ; sometimes, an electronic one specifically.
examples: The calculator on a bookkeeper's desk in the 1950s was an adding machine with mechanical guts.
I told him to hand me a calculator and he jokingly placed an adding machine at my side.

definitions.definition: A person who performs mathematical calculation .
examples: During the war, his grandmother had worked at the Bletchley Park decoding station as a calculator .

definitions.definition: A person who calculates (in the sense of scheming).
examples: He revealed himself to be a cold-blooded calculator out to sabotage his colleagues.

main_definition: A mechanical or electronic device that performs mathematical calculations ; sometimes, an electronic one specifically.
secondary_definitions: ( dated ) A person who performs mathematical calculation .
A person who calculates (in the sense of scheming).
( obsolete ) A set of mathematical tables .
